name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script and Reverse Shell Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a misconfigured web application to execute a malicious script that created a reverse shell on the compromised host.

action--bcf0c4e4-58d6-4a6e-bfd6-a94e4bc9.name: Kill malicious process
action--bcf0c4e4-58d6-4a6e-bfd6-a94e4bc9.description: Terminate the malicious process executing the script.

action--f58e427a-ab99-45c0-bc07-e2c8b8f1.name: Block outbound traffic to attacker's IP
action--f58e427a-ab99-45c0-bc07-e2c8b8f1.description: Prevent any outbound network connections to the attacker's server.

while-condition--7a65fd53-13e3-4e78-8f64.name: Scan and clean until no threats found
while-condition--7a65fd53-13e3-4e78-8f64.description: Scan the host for malicious artifacts, repeating until the scan is clean.

action--e5c04806-bef3-4b95-bf4d-16a23ec6.name: Run scan for malware
action--e5c04806-bef3-4b95-bf4d-16a23ec6.description: Execute a scan to identify and remove any remaining malicious files.

check-scan-status--2b3859ad-a5c8-49b2-8a.name: Check scan result
check-scan-status--2b3859ad-a5c8-49b2-8a.description: Determine if the scan was successful and if it cleaned all artifacts.
